name: File Prefixer
description: Prefixes all file names with a specified string.
longDescription: This script adds a custom prefix to all files in a directory, along with a sequential number. Files are processed in order of their modification time, and subdirectories are skipped.
author: ScriptHub

parameters.name: folder-path
parameters.label: Folder containing files:
parameters.description: Select the folder containing files to be renamed

parameters.name: prefix
parameters.label: Prefix text:
parameters.description: Text to add at the beginning of each filename
